title: mri_parse_sdcmdir
description: This program parses the Siemens DICOM files in a given directory and prints out information about each file.

outfile.title: Output file
outfile.description: Name of a file to which the results will be printed. If unspecified, the results will be printed to stdout.

summarize.title: Summarize flag
summarize.description: Only print out info for run leaders

dwi.title: DWI flag
dwi.description: Try to read DWI params. Generally no need to.
